sub_topic: The construction of the Peano curve.
message_1: What is the length of the first iteration of the Peano curve if each line segment is 1 unit long?
message_2: The Peano curve is a space-filling curve that consists of 9 smaller copies of itself, connected end-to-end. In the first iteration of the Peano curve, there are 9 line segments, each 1 unit long. Therefore, the length of the first iteration of the Peano curve is 9 units.
